Main_Event_Assessment_With_Annotation: The 2008 Queensland storms were a series of three thunderstorms that struck South East Queensland, Australia. Winds reached 130 kilometres (81 mi)/h, equivalent to a Category 3 cyclone.
Time_with_Annotation: The first storm hit on 16 November 2008 and was followed by two further storms on 19 and 20 November.

Specific_Instance_Per_Country_Displaceme.Displacement_with_annotation: Electricity was cut to about 230,000 homes and about 4,000 homes were left in need of serious repair, and at least 30 houses were beyond repair.

Torrential rain affected areas of Brisbane, Ipswich and Toowoomba, with rainfall reaching more than 250 mm in some locations. The Ipswich and Marburg areas were the worst affected, whilst four homes in inner-city Paddington were unroofed.
Blackwater, near Emerald in Central Queensland, was hit hard by the third storm, with 20 houses sustaining roof damage and up to 100 more were damaged in some way.

Specific_Instance_Per_Country_Economic_D.Economic_Damage_Assessment_with_annotati: Electricity was cut to about 230,000 homes and about 4,000 homes were left in need of serious repair, and at least 30 houses were beyond repair. Some of the worst hit areas included The Gap, Kenmore, Arana Hills and Albany Creek.
The Ipswich and Marburg areas were the worst affected, whilst four homes in inner-city Paddington were unroofed.
Blackwater, near Emerald in Central Queensland, was hit hard by the third storm, with 20 houses sustaining roof damage and up to 100 more were damaged in some way.

Perils_Assessment_With_Annotation.Wind: Winds reached 130 kilometres (81 mi)/h, equivalent to a Category 3 cyclone.
Perils_Assessment_With_Annotation.Rainfall: Torrential rain affected areas of Brisbane, Ipswich and Toowoomba, with rainfall reaching more than 250 mm in some locations.
Perils_Assessment_With_Annotation.Flood: The Inner City Bypass was flooded and forced to close, as was the Moggill Ferry.
Perils_Assessment_With_Annotation.Hail: Hail was described as the size of golf balls and witnesses saw a lot of damage.
Perils_Assessment_With_Annotation.Thunderstorm: The 2008 Queensland storms were a series of three thunderstorms that struck South East Queensland, Australia.
